title: Multilingual Translation Agent
description: AI-powered agent that translates text with automatic language detection.

text.title: Text to Translate
text.description: Enter the text you want the agent to process. Use this for long-form content or single sentences.

target_language.title: Target Language
target_language.description: The ISO code of the language you want to translate TO (e.g., FR for French, ES for Spanish). Must be a valid ISO 639-1 code.

source_language.title: Source Language (Optional)
source_language.description: The ISO code of the source language. Leave blank, and the agent will detect it automatically. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 code.

api_key.title: API Key (Optional)
api_key.description: Your LibreTranslate API key. Leave blank if not available.
